title: Correction: Growth-Blocking Peptides As Nutrition-Sensitive Signals for Insulin Secretion and Body Size Regulation
fullText: In the original version of the article, the middle image of Panel F in Fig 6 was accidentally duplicated. The correct version of Fig 6 can be found below. The figure legend and conclusion remain the same.
